mng: bill, list, form, single, only, sole, odd number

exm.mng: bill, list, form, single, only, sole, odd number
unit (of measure), unit (group of people as a whole), work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)
single, alone, individually, an odd one
alone, by oneself, on one's own
to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese), (fig.) to bear responsibility
not the only, not merely, not simply

unilateral, one-sided, home remedy, folk prescription(same as 丹方), single-drug prescription (same as 奇方[ji1 fang1], one of the seven kinds of prescriptions of Chinese medicine 七方[qi1 fang1]), metaphorically. a good solution
